cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 280 mi ESE of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward the north-central Gulf Coast (Mississippi/Alabama border area)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-central Gulf Coast near the Mississippi-Alabama border (mouth of the Pearl River area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches confined to portions of the north-central Gulf Coast; none for southeast Florida
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from the mouth of the Pearl River to the Alabamaâ€“Florida border; Tropical Storm Warning west of the Pearl River to east of Morgan City, LA and eastward to the Okaloosa-Walton County line, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-central Gulf Coast from southeastern Louisiana through coastal Mississippi and Alabama to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at Port Everglades
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated showers from distant outer bands; heavy rainfall not anticipated
